Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special session hosted by the AACR Radiation Science and Medicine Working Group, including the current Chair of the RSM Working Group, Dr. Silvia C. Formenti and Chair-Elect, Dr. Fei-Fei Liu. The 2023 RSM Town Hall will feature three presentations on current topics in the radiation science and medicine community, followed by a 15-minute panel discussion. The session will also include a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
SearchResultBody: TM07. Positioning the AACR at the Forefront of Radiation Science and Medicine Innovation: A Radiation Science and Medicine Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
Title: Positioning the AACR at the Forefront of Radiation Science and Medicine Innovation: A Radiation Science and Medicine Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
